Package controller

Class MainController

  • java.lang.Object
    • controller.Controller
      • controller.MainController
  • Direct Known Subclasses:
    MainController1, MainController2
    public abstract class MainController
extends Controller
    this class defines the basic controls for the main game
    Author:
    Luer Lyu

      • printNumber

        public Digit printNumber​(int x,
                         int y,
                         int n,
                         Digit digit)
        print the current score on the screen
        Parameters:
        x - the x position of the digit
        y - the y position of the digit
        n - the number need to be printed
        digit - the Digit object from the previous print representing the highest digit
        Returns:
        the Digit object on the highest weight in this round
